00002  *  maven Programming Language

00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "errors.h"
00010 #include "strings.h"
00011 
00012 int findEnumElement(MavenCompiler *c, string entity, int& namespaceID, int& enumID) {
00013         namespaceID = -1;
00014         enumID = -1;
00015         
00016         // bug #41: enumtype.enumelement
00017         StringList parts = split('.', entity);
00018         if(parts.length() > 1) {
00019                 // we dont have to check for ambiguous because for that to be true,
00020                 // there would have to be multiple enums by the same name, but the
00021                 // maven mapper will stop that
00022                 for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->length(); ++i) {
00023                         for(int j = 0; j < c->namespaces->at(i).enums.size(); ++j) {
00024                                 if(c->namespaces->at(i).enums[j].name == parts[0]) {
00025                                         for(int k = 0; k < c->namespaces->at(i).enums[j].items.size(); ++k) {
00026                                                 if(c->namespaces->at(i).enums[j].items[k].name == parts[1]) {
00027                                                         namespaceID = i;
00028                                                         enumID = j;
00029                                                         return k;
00030                                                 }
00031                                         }
00032                                 }
00033                         }
00034                 }
00035                 
00036                 // couldn't find it
00037                 return -1;
00038         }
00039         
00040         // we need to make sure it is not ambiguous
00041         int ambig_count = 0;
00042         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->length(); ++i) {
00043                 for(int j = 0; j < c->namespaces->at(i).enums.size(); ++j) {
00044                         for(int k = 0; k < c->namespaces->at(i).enums[j].items.size(); ++k) {
00045                                 if(c->namespaces->at(i).enums[j].items[k].name == entity)
00046                                         ++ambig_count;
00047                         }
00048                 }
00049         }
00050         if(ambig_count > 1) {
00051                 pushError(c, "Ambiguous enum element '%s'", entity);
00052                 return -2;
00053         }
00054         
00055         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->length(); ++i) {
00056                 for(int j = 0; j < c->namespaces->at(i).enums.size(); ++j) {
00057                         for(int k = 0; k < c->namespaces->at(i).enums[j].items.size(); ++k) {
00058                                 if(c->namespaces->at(i).enums[j].items[k].name == entity) {
00059                                         namespaceID = i;
00060                                         enumID = j;
00061                                         return k;
00062                                 }
00063                         }
00064                 }
00065         }
00066         
00067         // couldn't find it
00068         return -1;
00069 }
